languages.text: "Сообщения о духах, конечно, звучат как свидетельство ереси... но я бы поставил{mf||а} во главу угла свои интересы. Неважно как, но богатства Айона-VI принадлежали бы мне".

traits.locale_text: "Сообщения о духах, конечно, звучат как свидетельство ереси... но я бы поставил{mf||а} во главу угла свои интересы. Неважно как, но богатства Айона-VI принадлежали бы мне".

languages.text: "These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."
languages.original_text: "Сообщения о духах, конечно, звучат как свидетельство ереси... но я бы поставил{mf||а} во главу угла свои интересы. Неважно как, но богатства Айона-VI принадлежали бы мне".

traits.locale_text: "These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion-VI would be mine."
"These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion-VI would be mine."
"These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."
"These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."
"These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."

languages.text: “在我看来，这些关于鬼魂的报告，很显然是异端行为的证据……不过，我会将我的个人利益放在第一位。无论采取什么样的手段，艾恩六号星的财富都将属于我。”
languages.original_text: "These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，这些关于鬼魂的报告，很显然是异端行为的证据……不过，我会将我的个人利益放在第一位。无论采取什么样的手段，艾恩六号星的财富都将属于我。”

languages.text: «Estos informes de espíritus parecen ser prueba de herejía... pero antepondría mis intereses al resto de factores. Las riquezas de Aion VI serían mías, independientemente de los medios necesarios».
languages.original_text: "These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."

traits.locale_text: «Estos informes de espíritus parecen ser prueba de herejía... pero antepondría mis intereses al resto de factores. Las riquezas de Aion VI serían mías, independientemente de los medios necesarios».

languages.text: 「これらの精霊の報告は確かに異端の証拠のように聞こえます…しかし、私は自分の利益を最優先します。どんな手段を使わなければならないとしても、アイオン・VIの富は私のものです」
languages.original_text: "These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."

traits.locale_text: 「これらのスピリットの報告は確かに異端の証拠のように聞こえます…しかし、私は自分の利益を最優先します。どんな手段を使わなければならないとしても、アイオン・VIの富は私のものです」
「これらの精霊の報告は確かに異端の証拠のように聞こえます…しかし、私は自分の利益を最優先します。どんな手段を使わなければならないとしても、アイオン・VIの富は私のものです」

languages.text: « Ces rapports au sujet d'esprits laissent à penser que nous sommes en présence d'hérésie... mais je ferais passer mes intérêts avant tout. Quels que soient les moyens mis en place, les richesses d'Éon-VI finiraient par m'appartenir. »
languages.original_text: "These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."

traits.locale_text: « Ces rapports au sujet d'esprits laissent à penser que nous sommes en présence d'hérésie... mais je ferais passer mes intérêts avant tout. Quels que soient les moyens mis en place, les richesses d'Éon-VI finiraient pas m'appartenir. »

languages.text: "Diese Berichte über Geister klingen in der Tat wie Beweise für Ketzerei ... dennoch würde ich meinen Interessen Vorrang einräumen. Egal, welche Mittel erforderlich wären, die Reichtümer von Aion VI würden mir gehören."
languages.original_text: "These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Berichte über Geister klingen in der Tat wie Beweise für Ketzerei ... dennoch würde ich meinen Interessen Vorrang einräumen. Egal, welche Mittel erforderlich wären, die Reichtümer von Aion VI würden mir gehören."

languages.text: "Bu ruh haberlerinin kâfirliğin kanıtı olduğu muhakkak... Lakin çıkarlarımı ön plana alırdım. Başvuracağım yol ne olursa olsun Aion VI'nın zenginlikleri benim olurdu."
languages.original_text: "These reports of spirits certainly sound like evidence of heresy... however, I would put my interests first. No matter what means I would have to use, the riches of Aion VI would be mine."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ruh haberlerinin kâfirliğin kanıtı olduğu muhakkak... Lakin çıkarlarımı ön plana alırdım. Başvuracağım yol ne olursa olsun Aion VI'nın zenginlikleri benim olurdu."
